H0.text: What is the term used for a driver on Memorial Day weekend attempting to race in the Indianapolis 500 during the day and the Coca-Cola 600 during the night. Dual Challenge

H1.text: What is the term used for a driver on Memorial Day weekend attempting to race in the Indianapolis 500 during the day and the Coca-Cola 600 during the night. Memorial Day Marathon

H2.text: What is the term used for a driver on Memorial Day weekend attempting to race in the Indianapolis 500 during the day and the Coca-Cola 600 during the night. Indy-Charlotte Crossover

H3.text: What is the term used for a driver on Memorial Day weekend attempting to race in the Indianapolis 500 during the day and the Coca-Cola 600 during the night. Double

A6.text: The effort has been known as 'Double Duty'.

A7.text: In 2001, Tony Stewart became the first and to date only driver to complete the full race distance (1,100 miles) in both races on the same day.
